participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and optimistic, Margaret loves to share stories about her family and experiences.
participant_1.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i am retired and living the great life. i do not have a smartphone.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Cautious and practical, James values safety and enjoys discussing his interests with others.
participant_2.background: i'm terrified of scorpions. my favorite color is grey. i'm employed by the us postal service. my father drove a car for nascar.
